meanings.definition: Not cloyed or surfeited; not disgusted
meanings.sent1: After eating the fresh, uncloyed fruit, she felt satisfied and content.
meanings.sent2: The uncloyed taste of the homemade cookies brought a smile to his face.
meanings.sent3: The uncloyed sweetness of the dessert made her forget all about her diet.
meanings.sent4: His uncloyed enthusiasm for the project was contagious among the team.
meanings.sent5: The uncloyed aroma of the flowers filled the room with a delightful fragrance.
